name: lithographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is printed using a stone or metal block on which an image has been drawn with a thick substance that attracts ink, or relating to this process: The Christmas cards were all lithographically printed on high quality card. They reproduced texts lithographically, and almost exclusively by hand.
More examplesFewer examplesBoth pictures are well printed lithographically on an uncoated paper.It was soon published lithographically and sold tens of thousands of copies in six months.
